amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for school safety programs by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide funds by transfer for school safety programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Tancredo.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
